channel.title: Guyz Can you PLease Help ME I DOnt Understand
channel.description:
HEllo Guys My Problem is that when i run my source (server) it gives me this!? :mad: And i Have utorrent I aM from the netherlands i have a router.(modem)
[b]Error unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?[/b]
I AM MAKING A 317 CLient!
TY FOR YOUR HELP ;)

item.title: Guyz Can you PLease Help ME I DOnt Understand
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

no…>.< set the firewall exception for port 43594 then hit ok then hit it and change it to a random port then ok then it should work for ya i had the same problem.fyi for utorrent you only have to do it once then exit utorrent

Read full topic
item.source: Guyz Can you PLease Help ME I DOnt Understand

item.title: Guyz Can you PLease Help ME I DOnt Understand
item.dc:creator: @West7man West7man
item.description:
@West7man wrote:

Set server port to 41200 or something random and then in the client: File > New Port and enter the new port number.

Read full topic
item.source: Guyz Can you PLease Help ME I DOnt Understand

item.title: Guyz Can you PLease Help ME I DOnt Understand
item.dc:creator: @Nuggetdabest Nuggetdabest
item.description:
@Nuggetdabest wrote:

Hmm i don’t really recomend Utorrent. It’s really a last option. But get out of Utorrent, and your run.bat. Then run the source. then Run Utorrent. Hope i helped

Read full topic
